author: Jamie Crawley
title: Bitcoin Layer-2 Botanix Mainnet Debuts, Cuts Block Times to 5 Seconds
description: Botanix Labs has emphasized its decentralized governance, the launch coinciding with its transition to being operated by a federation of 16 node operators.
content: The mainnet of Botanix, a network designed to bring Ethereum-equivalent utility to the Bitcoin ecosystem, has gone live, slashing the time it takes to add new blocks to five seconds from 10 minutes.… [+1857 chars]
